code: var DIM='updateDom/DIM';var POPUP='updateDom/POPUP';var SLIDER='updateDom/SLIDER';var SIDEMENU='updateDom/SIDEMENU';var BUYBUTTON='updateDom/BUYBUTTON';export var updateDimDom=function updateDimDom(dimDom){return{type:DIM,dimDom:dimDom};};export var updatePopupDom=function updatePopupDom(popupDom){return{type:POPUP,popupDom:popupDom};};export var updateSliderDom=function updateSliderDom(sliderDom){return{type:SLIDER,sliderDom:sliderDom};};export var updateSideMenuDom=function updateSideMenuDom(sideMenuDom){return{type:SIDEMENU,sideMenuDom:sideMenuDom};};export var updateBuyButtonDom=function updateBuyButtonDom(buyButtonDom){return{type:BUYBUTTON,buyButtonDom:buyButtonDom};};var initialState={dimDom:null,popupDom:null,sliderDom:null,sideMenuDom:null,buyButtonDom:null};export default function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case DIM:return Object.assign({},state,{dimDom:action.dimDom});case POPUP:return Object.assign({},state,{popupDom:action.popupDom});case SLIDER:return Object.assign({},state,{sliderDom:action.sliderDom});case SIDEMENU:return Object.assign({},state,{sideMenuDom:action.sideMenuDom});case BUYBUTTON:return Object.assign({},state,{buyButtonDom:action.buyButtonDom});default:return state;}}
